name: SubmitPullRequestReview
description:
Submit a review for a pull request on GitHub.

Use this tool to submit a pending review for a specific pull request on GitHub. It can be used to approve, reject, or comment on changes in a pull request after a review has been created.

parameters.name: repository_owner
parameters.description: The account owner of the repository. Input is case insensitive.

value_schema.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: repository_name
parameters.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

value_schema.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

parameters.name: pull_request_number
parameters.description: The identifier number of the pull request to be reviewed.

value_schema.description: The number that identifies the pull request.

parameters.name: review_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the pull request review to be submitted.

value_schema.description: The unique identifier of the review.

parameters.name: review_action
parameters.description: Specify the review action: `APPROVE`, `REQUEST_CHANGES`, or `COMMENT`. Leaving this empty sets the review to `PENDING`.

value_schema.description: The review action you want to perform. The review actions include: `APPROVE`, `REQUEST_CHANGES`, or `COMMENT`. When you leave this blank, the API returns _HTTP 422 (Unrecognizable entity)_ and sets the review action state to `PENDING`, which means you will need to re-submit the pull request review using a review action.

parameters.name: review_body_text
parameters.description: The body text of the pull request review. Provide detailed feedback or comments for the review.

value_schema.description: The body text of the pull request review
